title: CNC Machinist
description: Seeking a skilled CNC Machinist to set up and operate computer numerical control machines to fabricate parts.
requirements: 2+ years of experience as a CNC machinist
responsibilities: Set up and operate CNC machines
Read and interpret blueprints for production

title: Tool and Die Maker
description: We are looking for an experienced Tool and Die Maker to construct and repair tools, dies, and specialized parts.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in tool and die making
Journeyman certificate in Tool and Die Making
responsibilities: Construct and repair tools and dies
Ensure precision and accuracy in the creation of components
qualifications: Experience with grinding, milling, and lathe machines

title: Welder/Fabricator
description: In search of a Welder/Fabricator to perform a variety of welding tasks and fabrication works.
requirements: 1+ year of experience in welding and fabrication
responsibilities: Perform welding tasks based on blueprints
qualifications: Proficiency in MIG, TIG, and stick welding

title: Machine Shop Supervisor
description: Hiring a Machine Shop Supervisor to oversee daily operations, ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Manufacturing or related field
5+ years of experience in a machine shop
responsibilities: Ensure projects are completed on time and within budget
qualifications: Experience with CNC machines and CAD software

title: Quality Inspector
description: We are seeking a Quality Inspector to inspect machined parts to ensure adherence to quality standards.
requirements: 1+ year of experience in quality inspection
